alert.note: Alert for Rota; Saipan; Tinian (Marianas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued October 09 at 4:07PM ChST until further notice by NWS Guam
info.description: CORRECTED FOR RAINFALL AMOUNTS ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Guam, Rota, Saipan and Tinian. * WHEN...Through Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Streams may rise out of their banks. Flash flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. Extensive street flooding is possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Tropical Storm Bolaven continues to approach the Marianas. As the storm gets closer, showers are expected to increase significantly. Latest model guidance indicates rainfall potential of 8 to 14 inches, with locally heavier amounts up to 20 inches possible. This would result in extensive flash flooding across the islands. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
